content.html: I miniaturised and laminated my doctorate certificate so that it fits in my purse and it amuses me no end. Haven't yet "accidentally" tried to pay for something with it - oh whoops SORRY thats just my PhD. #AcademicTwitter #AcademicChatter
content.value:
I miniaturised and laminated my doctorate certificate so that it fits in my purse and it amuses me no end.

Haven't yet "accidentally" tried to pay for something with it - oh whoops SORRY thats just my PhD.

#AcademicTwitter #AcademicChatter
